PAPER-LESS FIELD SURVEY

The Paperless Field Survey (PFS-18) is a powerful tool for the Field Engineers to go Paper-less.  It digitally captures the existing field data, network features and also helps in preparing proposed high level designs.  PFS-18 is the perfect answer for the day to day challenges faced in the field. 

 

Handling large size A1/A2 papers in the field is a difficult task. PFS-18 is a completely digital tool and thus eliminates manual notes and drawing on paper.  It comes with a rugged case and is light in weight.    

Highlights of PFS:

  • Powerful tool for MDU/SDU In-building drawings, Metro E Survey, As-built capture, Last mile connectivity & Permit Drawings
  • Eliminate non-standard symbols, hand written notations, manual drawings and difficulties in interpretations  Enable the Drafter to quickly & accurately complete drawings with high quality
  • Quickly prepare pre-engineering designs efficiently and directly from the field
  • Preliminary designs can be drawn accurately over :  o Photographs taken from the built-in camera o Stored pictures from the gallery o Google earth  or Google maps backdrop o Plain or Grid layouts
  • Legends, Pallet Icons, Line types & Colors customized to fit the requirement
  • Reduce rework and minimize revisits to the site
  • Transfer the files instantaneously to the Design Center over Wi-Fi/Cellular Network
  • Share the completed drawings as PDF/JPEG  via mail/cloud directly from the site
  • Edit, Store and Archive the drawings effortlessly   Easily collect GPS coordinates for all network elements  
  • External GNSS receiver can be integrated to achieve sub-meter/sub-foot accuracy
  • Export data in XML format as an input to CAD/AutoCAD/GPS platforms 

Where is PFS Usefull ?

  • In-building survey
  • Feasibility study for Designer
  • Field feasibility survey
  • Redline drawings preparation
  • Metro E Survey
  • Permit Drawings
  • As-built updation
